Detailed Description

The draw manager singleton.

static ckScr* ckDrawMgr::getScreen ( ckID  scr_id  )  [static]

Returns the specified screen.

If the specified screen doesn't exist, returns NULL. The new screen is linked to the last of the screen list.

Parameters:
[in] scr_id A screen ID.
Returns:
A screen.
